title: How to Make Libum

steps.headline: Put the cheese into a medium size mixing bowl.
Mash well with the fingers until it becomes a smooth, lump free paste.
Add the flour and mix well with the fingers.
Add the beaten egg and mix well.
steps.description: The dough will be rather sticky.

steps.headline: Divide the dough into two equal parts, then form two round, flat, ⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) thick loaves.
Lay each on three bay leaves set on a greased baking sheet.
Bake in a preheated 400ºF/200ºC oven for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, or until cooked through.
Remove the loaves from the oven, spread the tops with the honey, and let cool.
Remove the bay leaves before serving.

text: Put the cheese into a medium size mixing bowl.  Mash well with the fingers until it becomes a smooth, lump free paste.  Add the flour and mix well with the fingers.  Add the beaten egg and mix well. The dough will be rather sticky. Divide the dough into two equal parts, then form two round, flat, ⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) thick loaves.  Lay each on three bay leaves set on a greased baking sheet.  Bake in a preheated 400ºF/200ºC oven for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, or until cooked through.  Remove the loaves from the oven, spread the tops with the honey, and let cool.  Remove the bay leaves before serving.  Finished.
